chapter.title: Compute Summary
chapter.para: The Compute Summary page in the Compute section gives you access to inventory, capacity, and alarm summaries.

section.title: Inventory Summary
section.para: The Inventory Summary section provides an overview of compute alarms by status. These alarms are grouped by control plane. There is also information on resource usage for each compute host. Here you can also see alarms triggered on individual compute hosts.

section.title: Capacity Summary
section.para: Capacity Summary offers an overview of the utilization of physical resources and allocation of virtual resources among compute nodes. Here you will also find a break-down of CPU, memory, and storage usage across all compute resources in the cloud.

section.title: Compute Summary
section.para: The Compute Summary show overviews of new alarms as well as a list of all alarms that can be filtered and sorted. For more information on filtering alarms, see .
